text: <a href="../1-Corinthians-4-1/" title="1 Corinthians 4:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Let a man so account of us, as of the ministers of Christ, and stewards of the mysteries of God.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-2/" title="1 Corinthians 4:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 Moreover it is required in stewards, that a man be found faithful.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-3/" title="1 Corinthians 4:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 But with me it is a very small thing that I should be judged of you, or of man's judgment: yea, I judge not mine own self.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-4/" title="1 Corinthians 4:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 For I know nothing by myself; yet am I not hereby justified: but he that judgeth me is the Lord.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-5/" title="1 Corinthians 4:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 Therefore judge nothing before the time, until the Lord come, who both will bring to light the hidden things of darkness, and will make manifest the counsels of the hearts: and then shall every man have praise of God.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-6/" title="1 Corinthians 4:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And these things, brethren, I have in a figure transferred to myself and *to* Apollos for your sakes; that ye might learn in us not to think *of men* above that which is written, that no one of you be puffed up for one against another.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-7/" title="1 Corinthians 4:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 For who maketh thee to differ *from another*? and what hast thou that thou didst not receive? now if thou didst receive *it*, why dost thou glory, as if thou hadst not received *it*?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-8/" title="1 Corinthians 4:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 Now ye are full, now ye are rich, ye have reigned as kings without us: and I would to God ye did reign, that we also might reign with you.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-9/" title="1 Corinthians 4:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 For I think that God hath set forth us the apostles last, as it were appointed to death: for we are made a spectacle unto the world, and to angels, and to men.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-10/" title="1 Corinthians 4:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 We *are* fools for Christ's sake, but ye *are* wise in Christ; we *are* weak, but ye *are* strong; ye *are* honourable, but we *are* despised.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-11/" title="1 Corinthians 4:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 Even unto this present hour we both hunger, and thirst, and are naked, and are buffeted, and have no certain dwellingplace;

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-12/" title="1 Corinthians 4:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 And labour, working with our own hands: being reviled, we bless; being persecuted, we suffer it:

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-13/" title="1 Corinthians 4:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 Being defamed, we intreat: we are made as the filth of the world, *and are* the offscouring of all things unto this day.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-14/" title="1 Corinthians 4:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 I write not these things to shame you, but as my beloved sons I warn *you*.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-15/" title="1 Corinthians 4:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 For though ye have ten thousand instructors in Christ, yet *have ye* not many fathers: for in Christ Jesus I have begotten you through the gospel.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-16/" title="1 Corinthians 4:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 Wherefore I beseech you, be ye followers of me.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-17/" title="1 Corinthians 4:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 For this cause have I sent unto you Timotheus, who is my beloved son, and faithful in the Lord, who shall bring you into remembrance of my ways which be in Christ, as I teach every where in every church.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-18/" title="1 Corinthians 4:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 Now some are puffed up, as though I would not come to you.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-19/" title="1 Corinthians 4:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 But I will come to you shortly, if the Lord will, and will know, not the speech of them which are puffed up, but the power.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-20/" title="1 Corinthians 4:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 For the kingdom of God *is* not in word, but in power.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-4-21/" title="1 Corinthians 4:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 What will ye? shall I come unto you with a rod, or in love, and *in* the spirit of meekness?
